content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'primaryfilesystem_orrindatalake_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [primaryfilesystem_orrindatalake_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://primaryfilesystem@orrindatalake.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

drop external table game01daily;
go

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE game01daily (
	[dateandtime] datetime2(7),
	[location] nvarchar(4000),
	[net_ping] float,
	[refresh_rate] float
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = '01-raw-incoming/game-telemetry/game-01/daily/',
	DATA_SOURCE = [primaryfilesystem_orrindatalake_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.game01daily
GO
